statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 6 \\ 11 \\ -13 \\ -14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ 2 \\ 11 \\ -19 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 4 \\ 0 \\ 6 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
